item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description: Hey, you should advertise your blog as "Hand-crafted"! After all, unless your posts are being generated by a team of Shakespeare monkeys or the latest generation of artificial intelligence, your posts are "finely hand-crafted by our certified postologists."
item.content:encoded: Hey, you should advertise your blog as “Hand-crafted”! After all, unless your posts are being generated by a team of Shakespeare monkeys or the latest generation of artificial intelligence, your posts are “finely hand-crafted by our certified postologists.”
